name: Ecosia - Dark theme 2020
description: Ecosia dark theme - verified and working 2020 A dark theme for the Ecosia search engine & services. Uses lightweight CSS to ensure a seamless dark theme experience. Compatibility • Tested on browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera • Works with Ecosia mobile-mode • Tested on 'Stylish' and 'Stylus' extensions Currently works with the following Ecosia sites: • www.ecosia.org • info.ecosia.org • blog.ecosia.org Planned development: • ecosia.teemill.com Any issues, let me know and the theme will be updated ASAP - just ensure you are using the latest version at all times Important note: To turn on/off Ecosia advertisements in the search engine, see the 'Customize Settings' button found next to the installation button Development Team: • FocusOnTheSun - Search engine dark theme • Freaky Lord - Information site, blogs & consultancy

user.name: FocusOnTheSun
